creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: dark blue cotton skirt with yellow silk leaf motifs; round mirrors (mica?) with red embroidered edges; top 5" are brown with a drawstring with elaborate beaded wool tassel and bobbles; bottom is embroidered on edge, 1-1/2", with red and yellow silk
